Posts.EditableText:
Just athought and may have already been suggested / thought of (did do a search, couldn't find anything I thought relevent).

Firstly i am new to this, but FWIW, the Misc ASL window is OK, but i would rather be able to place direct snippets of code where I want them (for ease of human reading) without having to open the ASL in a text editor.  We have the misc ASL and the Code Viewer, could they not somehow be combined?

Just athought and may have already been suggested / thought of (did do a search, couldn't find anything I thought relevent).

Firstly i am new to this, but FWIW, the Misc ASL window is OK, but i would rather be able to place direct snippets of code where I want them (for ease of human reading) without having to open the ASL in a text editor. We have the misc ASL and the Code Viewer, could they not somehow be combined?
